long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on is for use with Liquidware's Stratusphere™ UX product, which helps companies manage, monitor, and optimize their digital workspaces. The Liquidware Browser Monitor for Firefox collects browser metrics, such as a user's current open tabs or the full list of add-ons installed in the browser, and uploads the data to the company's Stratusphere™ hub.

For a guide on how to use this extension in conjunction with Liquidware's Stratusphere™ UX product, please click the following link: https://docs.liquidware.com/stratusphere/en-us/670/installation-guide/capturing-browser-metrics.htm
